title: allavett
author: allavett
content: CEC Bounty BotWhat it is?- Simple Telegram bot that makes it easy to distribute coins and tokens:Create Twitter bounties to get more followers or likes and retweetsTip, rain or flood the selected assetsWho is it for?- People or projects that want to increase their presence on Twitter- Projects that want to distribute their coins/tokens effortlessly to their community- People who want to earn various cryptocurrencies for completing simple tasksHow does it work?- The user needs to have Telegram messaging app to be able to use it- To complete tasks, the user needs to link their Twitter account- To create new bounties for others to complete, the user needs to deposit assets onto the platformWhat chains does it support?- Bitcoin based custom chainsLitecoin (LTC), Dash (DASH), Verge (XVG), Electra Protocol (XEP), DogeCash (DOGEC), DeviantCoin (DEV) - Major smart chainsBinance Smart Chain with BinanceCoin (BNB), WarpBeam (WBM), SuperDoge (SUPDOG) tokensPolygon aka Matic network with Matic (MATIC), Havens Nook (HXN) tokensDEMO- How to claim bounty reward?- How to create a new bounty?Website | Telegram group | Telegram bot | Twitter
